bottle.name: 2016 Little Pioneer South East Australia Verdelho
bottle.short_tasting_note: Full of exuberant, ripe tropical fruit, this Australian white is easy to love. A good vein of acidity running throughout the palate lends energy and drive.
bottle.tasting_note: Full of exuberant, ripe tropical fruit, this Australian white is easy-to-love. A good vein of acidity running throughout the palate, lends energy and drive, making it a pleasure to sip on its own, or with your favorite Thai recipes.
